title: Dragonborn Cass
body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nFp3D2O.jpg[/img]

Q a mini explosion 
W a ring of fire or lava
E a red fang
R burn them to ash

PLOX RIOT

https://www.artstation.com/artist/puppetj
the artist

Edit:
The art is not cass....): is just an idea that came to me based on that art.

she downgraded from snake to worm HUE
wrong she is upgraded from medusa to naga
Isn't a naga just a half snake/half lady though. I swear I've seen it used in that context before.
Medusa is definitely an upgrade from naga because she can turn people to stone by looking at them... also nagas are just fish/snake people by google images.

YES. She needs a skin that doesn't look like pure shit.

Only like half of her skins are like that. xP
The only skins she has that are decent are her chromas.
Sadly its not gonna happend, to make riot take the proyect need it to be drawed like a 5y/o child.

Not true we got Pool Party Ziggs it was drawn by an artist with similar skill.

 It just takes the right amount of support for Riot to take a concept.
beautiful would be an amazing skin!
I would like Wyrm cass or Dragonwing Cass
do u know cass is resemblance of medusa? so how come her Ultimate be "turning to ash" instead of "petrify"
Did you know that Brand and Annie are fire mages? And that they both have ice skins? Skins can change the champion's concept. That's kind of the point.
what ever the skin is the effect u are getting out of the ability is same in any skin 100% of all skins

Because a skin can completely alter the resemblance of a champion. "Do you know Lee Sin is based on kicking? Why make a skin where he boxes?" Skins create alternate universes, they don't have to make sense to the original story line or resemblances.
riot pliz give
Could work, but i'd bet money Bethseda and Zenimax would file a lawsuit for the term dragon born. Cause apparently they can own words like that.

Copyright laws state that you can't copyright words, titles, and phrases.
It does not apply to trademark though, and I highly doubt they made "dragon born" their trademark.

> [{quoted}](name=Onan the man99,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0myORNIw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-29T16:34:40.583+0000)
>
> Could work, but i'd bet money Bethseda and Zenimax would file a lawsuit for the term dragon born. Cause apparently they can own words like that.

Then how about Infernal Cassiopeia :D :D 

P.s. Ult should also shoot out some smoke and flame in addition to scorching them to ash. Just sayin.

And this art is beautiful. I support this 101%.

> [{quoted}](name=Onan the man99,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0myORNIw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-29T16:34:40.583+0000)
>
> Could work, but i'd bet money Bethseda and Zenimax would file a lawsuit for the term dragon born. Cause apparently they can own words like that.

Highly doubtful considering the term "Dragon born" has been around since Dungeons and dragons 3.5 or earlier. So I highly doubt they could even attempt that.

Update 3.5 has been out since 2003.

But just Dragon or Fire Scales Cassiopeia is not
TBH I love the concept though I think she should have more than a floating scale bra that looks like something from an eroge lol.  Other than that its pretty badass, would buy.
more like snakeborn amirite
It'd be cool if her walking animation was of her hovering above the ground sort of like the way Chinese Dragons (The snake-like dragons for those who don't know) do.
The art is not even Cass :/
I need dis. Cass needs a good skin ;-;

I don't really care what you call it, base anything on that art and it would probably be half as amazing and thus an instant buy.
